0.3.2.name: wordpress/feedblitz-email-subscription
0.3.2.description:
This WordPress plugin will give the best way to keep up with your content feed by placing a feedblitz email subscription on your wordpress site. Feedblitz Email Subscription gives the best way to keep up with your content feed by placing a feedblitz email subscription on your wordpress site. Easy to customize, just put your feed id and publisher id and your ready to lunch. Shortcode usage:[feedblitz id="your_feed_id" publisher_id="your_publisher_id"].

Key Features & Options

  • With additional admin panel
  • Template function
  • Support shortcode
  • Extensive widget options
  • Widget intro text and outro-text for your additional information, support HTML.

For Further Readings

If you have any trouble for setting the Feedblitz Email Subscription, please read this articles for getting it works perfectly as you wish.
